name: The One Who Struggles
description:
The One Who Struggles is a boss battle game currently in development where you fight against a single multi-phase boss.

Current Features
  • 3 Weapons, each with multiple attack styles.
  • Chunky Pixel Art!
  • Nuanced movement
Future Features (probably?)
  • Customizablity! - rebind controls, set challenge preferences, some sort of color blind options.
  • AUDIO - both sound AND music (wow)
  • Actual menus and a whole dang title screen!
  • The other two phases of the boss
  • Bug fixing, refactoring, and all that other boring technical junk. Unless I can't figure it out or people actually really like the jank for some reason.
  • Probably some stuff suggested through player feedback.
Development

This project is currently in development and each Sunday I will be releasing a new build along with a devlog for that week. The goal is to finish it by the end of June. It'll be available for free until it's done. If you download it now you'll have access to it as long as itch is around.
